hero.title: STAY
hero.subtitle: Spicy. Updated.
hero.text: At ZingZing, every month brings something new — new flavors, new faces, and new adventures. Here you’ll find the latest updates, event highlights, and stories from our journey across Central Asia and beyond.

sections.title: Brand News
sections.text: Discover what’s cooking behind the scenes! From product launches to packaging updates, our team constantly works to make every ZingZing snack fresher, bolder, and better than before.

sections.title: Events & Exhibitions
sections.text: ZingZing loves to meet people! We take part in food fairs, expos, and local festivals — sharing our story, our spice, and our smiles with everyone we meet.

sections.title: Giveaways
sections.text: We love giving back to our fans! Follow ZingZing on social media for monthly giveaways, surprise snack boxes, and limited-edition merchandise.
